ending_theme: #01: "Kinpika Complete (きんぴかコンプリート)" by Kakeru Shiwasu (Yuki Kaji) (ep 1)

#04: "Kimi to Prominence (キミとプロミネンス)" by You Hazuki (Tetsuya Kakihara) (ep 4)
#05: "Namae no Nai Monogatari (名前の無い物語) "by Haru Yayoi (Tomoaki Maeno) (ep 5)
#07: "Koibana (コイバナ)" by Koi Kisaragi (Toshiki Masuda) (ep 7)
#08: "Nenka Zokusou (燃歌続走)" by Iku Kannazuki (Kensho Ono) (ep 8)
#10: "Getsumen Kansatsu (月面観察)" by Yoru Nagatsuki (Takashi Kondou) (ep 10)
#11: "Hajime Chouka (始蝶歌)" by Hajime Mutsuki (Kousuke Toriumi) (ep 11)
#12: "Cry for xxx" by Shun Shimotsuki (Ryouhei Kumura)  (ep 12)
